name: Fountain Of Youth
description:
An angry mob of grumpy old people are destroying the planet! Lucky for you, you have found the fountain of youth  and will solve the worlds problems by turning them in to cute itty bitty babies awwww. 

This is my entry for brakeys game jam, based on the theme rewind, its very buggy definitely not finished but I would really appreciate if you played and left some feed back, Thanks !
